mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (`name`, `password`, sex, des, user_type) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, `password`, sex, des, user_type from user
